sentences.en: A certificate issued by a duly authorized manager of the buyer from the issuing date stating the avowal and warrant substantiality to be reality and accurate.
sentences.cn: 由购买方的一位正式授权的管理人员于开始日出具的表明购买方的声明和保证在所有实质性方面均为真实和正确的证书；

sentences.en: Avowal. Sonnez. I could . Rebound of garter . Not leave thee. Smack.
sentences.cn: 表表心迹. 敲响你,我舍,吊袜带弹回,不得离开你呀. 啪达.

sentences.en: He shrank back a little from her as she made this free avowal.
sentences.cn: 听她直言不讳地供认,他便往后缩了缩,隔她远一点.

sentences.en: Set in small-town Iowa in 1956, Gilead is a quiet, slow-moving but ultimately majestic avowal of the redemptive power of love. LA
sentences.cn: 《吉利德》以1956年爱荷华州的小镇为背景，故事恬静而舒缓，但最终成为爱的救赎力的宏大声明。

sentences.en: The minister of police maintained a silence which was equivalent to a complete avowal.
sentences.cn: 警务大臣一声不响了,这无疑是一种默认.

sentences.en: The press carried his avowal throughout the country.
sentences.cn: 全国的报纸登载了他承认的消息.

words.tran_cn: 公开宣布的；公开承认的；公然的
声明（avow的过去式和过去分词）
承认；公开宣称；坦率承认
声明，公开表示；公开宣布
